## Type.coerce() method

Coerce the value into this type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
coerce(value: any, options?: Options): T | null | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>any</code> | The value to be coerced |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for coercion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T | null | undefined`

Coerced value of this type
